Therefore, it is much more effective to work from the subconscious to reprogram it with new beliefs like: 'I feel safe,' 'I trust myself,' or 'Money comes to me easily.' With this new information, it is much easier to achieve the results you want and live a life without stress.","document":"reprogrammingPDF","modalImage":"reprogrammingModal","modalImageMobile":"reprogrammingModalMobile"},"sound_healing":{"title":"Sound Healing","intro":"Sound Therapy","icon":"sound","copy":"Sound therapy is an excellent tool to restore the physical body’s balance and harmonize emotional and mental states, as well as to connect with the inner self. Achieving states of clarity and deep peace. For the nervous system, sound can be a complement to treat depression, anxiety, stress, insomnia, and more. Using specific frequencies, it is possible to modify brain waves to generate states of creativity, concentration, relaxation, or deep sleep.","modalImage":"soundModal","modalImageMobile":"soundModalMobile"},"ceremonias_holisticas":{"title":"Holistic Ceremonies","intro":"Circles of Light","icon":"ceremonies","copy":"Celebrate new cycles in your life with honor. These are sacred spaces designed to CONNECT and MANIFEST from the heart, creating moments of deep connection, surrounded by your loved ones, holding and celebrating this special chapter of your life. Experience it either in a group or individually, each occasion is unique.","modalImage":"ceremoniesModal","modalImageMobile":"ceremoniesModalMobile"},"aromaterapia":{"title":"Aromatherapy","intro":"Essential Oils","icon":"aromatherapy","copy":"Natural essences that protect plants from their environment and diseases can also be your source of well-being. Take advantage of these natural properties to improve your everyday life.","modalImage":"aromatherapyModal","modalImageMobile":"aromatherapyModalMobile"}},"whoIam":{"title":"Hello! I'm Ana Briones","subTitle":"Welcome to this space full of light and personal growth!","copy_1":"From the heart of Mexico, I have been dedicated to personal development and expanding consciousness for over 16 years. This journey, full of self-discovery and reconnection with my inner power, has allowed me to work with various groups and discover my true passion: serving. Now, my purpose is to share this experience with you and accompany you on your own journey of transformation and liberation.","copy_2":"It is an honor to accompany you on this journey, exploring together the infinite possibilities that await you. I invite you to begin this journey towards fullness."},"moreAboutMe":[{"title":"Credentials that support my practice","details":[{"text":"I have a degree in Organizational Psychology; I am a certified Personal and Organizational Coach from Tecnológico de Monterrey and have trained as a PSYCH-K® Facilitator with Rita Funes and Martha Vargas.","index":1},{"text":"I have complemented my knowledge as a Sound Therapist certified by the International Sound Therapy Institute, with a specialization in Rapid Release Therapy, which has allowed me to offer practical and effective support, with a holistic and integrated vision.","index":2},{"text":"My experience expands to designing intentional spaces as a Holistic Ceremonies Facilitator, where I harmoniously weave all my previous knowledge to create experiences that nurture both body and soul.","index":3}]},{"title":"My personal philosophy","details":[{"text":"The most important school for me is life experience itself; learning to unlearn every day because I firmly believe that we can all access infinite possibilities to live a more harmonious life.","index":1},{"text":"From this awareness and humility of not having the absolute truth, I open myself to share and accompany other human beings in their life processes with the conviction that the power to heal resides in every Being.

Not having the absolute truth, I open myself to share and accompany other human beings in their life processes with the conviction that the power to heal resides in every Being.","index":2}]},{"title":"My favorite beliefs:","details":[{"text":"- My favorite beliefs:","index":1},{"text":"- I am my priority","index":2},{"text":"- The world is a safe place for my children","index":2},{"text":"- It's okay to have more money than I need","index":2}]}],"keywords":{"metaLanding":"Discover the benefits of holistic ceremonies and sound healing. Emotional transformation and subconscious reprogramming with PSYCH-K® for your overall well-being. Join Coach Ana Briones and begin your journey towards balance and healing.","metaRegister":"Sign up today to access our holistic therapies, spiritual ceremonies, and sound healing. Transform your life with PSYCH-K® and unlock your potential. Join our well-being community.","metaLogin":"Log in to your account and begin your transformation journey with Coach Ana Briones. Enjoy personalized sound healing therapies, PSYCH-K® sessions, and holistic ceremonies for your well-being.","metaAgenda":"Check Coach Ana Briones' agenda to book your sound healing session, spiritual ceremonies, and subconscious reprogramming with PSYCH-K®. Start your journey to well-being today.","titleLanding":"Coach Ana Briones | Holistic Ceremonies, Sound Healing, and PSYCH-K® for Your Well-being","titleRegister":"Sign up at Coach Ana Briones | Holistic Therapies, Sound Healing, and Subconscious Reprogramming","titleLogin":"Log in | Access Your Sound Healing and Transformation Sessions with PSYCH-K®","titleAgenda":"Coach Ana Briones' Agenda | Book Your Sound Healing and Subconscious Reprogramming Session"},"forms":{"fileForm":{"fullName":"Nombre completo","upload":"Subir","uploading":"Subiendo archivo...","uploaded":"Archivo subido","error":"Error al subir archivo"}}}
